definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: go out, be extinguished (poet. & esp. Wisd. lit.) (Aram. [[דְּעִיח]], d9ek)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 mpl. [[דָּֽעֲכוּ]] Is 43:17; Impf. [[יִדְעַח]] Pr 20:20, [[יִדְעָָח]] Job 18:5 + 4 t.;—go out, be extinguished, of lamp, always fig., lamp of wicked (i.e. prosperity) [[אוֹר רְשָׁעִים]] Job 18:5, ´[[נֵר ר]] Job 18:6, Job 21:17, Pr 13:9, Pr 20:20, Pr 24:20; of hostile armies Is 43:17 (‖[[כָּב֫וּ]]).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[נִדְעֲכוּ]] be made extinct, dried up, Job 6:17 (of brooks).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[דּׂעֲכוּ]] of assailants, be extinguished, quenched, [[כְּאֵשׁ קוֹחִים]] Ps 118:12; but rd. perh. [[בערו]] with LXX Bae & Che, v. Che:crit. n.
